projects.title: GymHub
projects.description: GymHub: A MERN stack platform connecting gyms, trainers, and fitness enthusiasts. Features include subscription management, real-time chat, secure payments, location services, and push notifications. Built with TypeScript, MUI, Redux, and Clean Architecture, it offers a comprehensive solution for gym management and user engagement.

projects.title: Cornerstone
projects.description: Cornerstone: An e-commerce platform for watches, built with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. Features include dynamic product showcases, referral rewards, coupon system, wallet management, and multiple payment options. The admin dashboard provides sales insights and reporting. Hosted on AWS, it offers a seamless shopping experience with efficient order and inventory management.

projects.title: Shortrr
projects.description: Shortrr: All-in-one link management tool. Shorten URLs, generate QR codes, and track clicks in real-time. Get insights on user locations and device types with sleek analytics. User-friendly design for effortless link optimization and audience understanding.

projects.title: Youtube Clone
projects.description: This project reimagines YouTube using React and Redux, featuring live API search, nested comments, infinite scroll, and live chat functionality. It showcases efficient, user-centric design with modern web technologies, creating an engaging and dynamic video platform.

projects.title: Burger Store
projects.description: Created a Tailwind-based a restaurant website with Swiggy API integration. Implemented React Loading Skeleton for shimmer effects, React Router DOM for navigation, and Redux for state management. Utilized a config-driven approach for scalability and maintainability.

projects.title: Olx Clone
projects.description: Built an OLX clone using Firebase for seamless user authentication and real-time updates, ensuring a secure and dynamic marketplace experience.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.description: Created a Netflix-inspired platform powered by Firebase, offering smooth user authentication and real-time content updates for an immersive streaming experience.
